extendedInfo.description: Keep EVERYTHING in one place. Do everything with ONE TAP.Everything is a fast, simple and colorful list manager for to-dos, groceries and everything else. This includes wish, trip, cook, shopping, homework, meeting, book, movie, download and task lists.Using Everything is as easy as writing on a piece of paper and unlike a piece of paper, you can modify your lists freely and easily.How to use:1) To create a list:Press the green plus button at the bottom of the home screen and it will take you to the "Add List" screen. Write the name of the list and pick a color; after you are done press the "enter" key in your keyboard and it will save your list. If you would like to discard the list simply press "back" button of your phone.2) To change the color of your list:Simply press the color circle at the right hand side of the list or you can long press on the list and there will be a menu appearing with "Edit" option. You can change the name and color of the list through this edit option. (Note: The numbers in color circles shows you the number of items you have in that list)3) To add items in a list:Click on the list and it will take you to the "Items Screen". When you click the green clipboard button at the bottom of the screen you can add/edit items in the "Add Items Screen". Simply write each item in a separate row; for example:CheeseGround meetBreadIf you would like to add some details to your items you can add them by separating with a forward slash (/):Cheese / Parmesan, fetaGround meet / 2 poundsBread / Italian, whiteWhen you are done, click the green tick button at the right top corner and it will save the items and go back to items screen. You can press on the items you are done with and it will put a blue tick mark on them, if you would like to delete them you can simply press the red cross button at the bottom of the screen and all the ticked items will be deleted. You can uncheck the items by pressing on them one more time and tick mark will disappear. When you check an item it goes to the bottom of the list, when you uncheck it it goes back at the top.4) To delete a list:You have two options: You can either delete them by pressing the blue eraser button at the bottom of the screen and then pressing on "delete" button or you can long press on the list and there will be a menu appearing with a "Delete" option. Either of these will delete the item.5) To change the background image:Go to "Options Screen" by pressing the yellow options button at the bottom of the home screen. When you tap on a background app will automatically save it. You can simply press the home button at the bottom left corner to go back to home screen.I hope you will enjoy my app. You can contact me for any suggestions. Thank you for using Everything!(Please contact me before giving 1, 2 or 3 star ratings. I will be very happy to correct the things you don't like in my application. I don't even put advertisements for your comfort, I will be very glad to make it better with your feedbacks. Thank you!)NOTE on 9/3/2012: I have fixed many crashing points except the background change. I am still working on it. I will release another update in a couple of days. Thank you for your patience and I apologize for the inconvenience.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: So simple and easy to use. I love this app.
reviews.author: Mandy Gallucci

reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
reviews.comment: If you would make in that style with those colours an upgrated version with more subfolders and lists, calendar, reminders and online back-up, I would pay ANY price you would name. PLEASE consider it! It\'s so cheerful, practical, neat and organized it literally made my day!!! Thank you for this wonderful app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing and that\'s what I\'m lookin for!!!
reviews.comment: Wow but it crashes every time...love all the details and amazingly simple\342\231\245\342\231\245\342\231\245\342\231\245\342\231\245
reviews.author: Faith Gara

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: No fuss, straight forward. Just what I needed. You can make different lists and mark it down as you complete a task. No Calendar entries but that Is not what I wanted. Just easy and to the point. Thanks developers
reviews.author: Chanine Nel

reviews.title: Data back up should provided
reviews.comment: Good app ,data backup, wadgets should make it execllent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: J Tullis
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time with this app.  It is a very poor excuse for a list generating software.  Has no instructions.  Does not indicate when lists are saved or deleted.  Entered grocery lists several times and never knew if they would remain when I went to look for them. Most of the time they were gone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: List of Lists
reviews.comment: Easy to Organize... to do list, grocery list, walmart list, honey-do list, etc and you can personalize with colors.
reviews.author: pam Anders

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I have tried around 3 to do lists but nothing seems to satisfy me. Till I decided to go online and scan here using my laptop than my phone. And I found this. I like it that it is so colorful for am so fond of themes. It has choices for me to choose from depending on my moods yet so simple to do. Thank you! Now I look forward to using this any minute of the day to remind me stuff I have to go through. Maybe you can do a similar type for a journal? My journal is so simple and lacks personality.
reviews.author: pamela natalie yanson

reviews.title: FABULOUS!!!
reviews.comment: i couldn\'t find a pen for my to do list, and luckily stumbled across this app. So simple, straight forward, and cheerful. My life is much more simplified. I never rate apps, but this one is worth my time! Good job!
reviews.author: Katie Laudenslager

reviews.title: Elegant list maker
reviews.comment: I\'m fussy about these things and have tried others - I love Everything! It\'s simple and streamlined and good looking. I came back to search for it in order to post this review.  In a way, it\'s better that you can\'t have sub-lists; it forces you to be more  organized in your list making. I prefer it not cluttered with a calendar.  Thank you, Merci for app!
reviews.author: June Czerwinski

reviews.title: Ok i guess
reviews.comment: Firstly i just wanna commend you on the effort and quality of this. It is just very nice but just lacking a little. I don\'t hate it. It needs a bit of work. Try to make it easier to use by using words instead of symbols and perhaps makean intro movie so i could know how to use it. It is very good but i don\'t need to. It is a.good app. But.....
reviews.author: Natalie Tseung

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: I would love to be able to re-arrange the order of the lists freely, or automatic arrangement by color.
reviews.author: Ashley Harrington

reviews.title: Everything but the widget!
reviews.comment: Love the app...easy and functional, perfect for my needs. Please, PLEASE make a widget...it is one of the few things I would PAY for! Nice work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Spent way too long today looking for an app that does just this. I needed a simple list application with various subheadings without the calendar etc.   My only issue is the lack of customisation. Would love to see more colours, backgrounds, fonts, dividers etc. But that\'s just me candidate my desire to colour coded everything. Overall, very happy.
reviews.author: Lauren Snowden

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it.. is there somehow I can get reminders and use a calendar
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Colorful simple
reviews.comment: Easy to use.
reviews.author: Cristal Osborne

reviews.title: Best Organiser out there!
reviews.comment: Fantastic! Very easy to use and does exactly what it says on the tin!  A widget would be a much welcomed addition.
reviews.author: Elle Bridge

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Please make it so you can have preferences to the list items. Otherwise awesome love it!!!
reviews.author: Apoorva M

reviews.title: Very Simple List App
reviews.comment: Good if you\'re looking for a very simple (colorful) list app.  Very limited features and no instructions.  Too limited for my taste.
reviews.author: KS S.

reviews.comment: Nice idea, and worked fine, but I just didn\'t use it.
reviews.author: Louise Bruce
